steps.title: Standing there alone, the ship is waiting
text: All systems are go, are you sure?

steps.title: The countdown starts
text: Watching in a trance, the crew is certain
"Send me up a drink", jokes Major Tom

steps.title: Second stage is cut, we're now in orbit
text: "What will it effect, when all is done",Thinks Major Tom

steps.title: Across the stratosphere
text: A final message, "Give my wife my love"

steps.title: Now the light commands, this is my home
